name: CamVigilVideoCall
0:
”Alexa, please call front door.”
”Alexa, talk to the front door.”
”Alexa, stop.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1. Apply for CamVigil account
2. Find CamVigil Video Skills in Alexa Skills . Use your CamVigil account to log in the associated skills
3. Connected account was successful and device was found successfully
4. When a doorbell event occurs, Alexa plays the doorbell announcement on the selected Echo devices.
